name: Hostel Galeria 13

reviews.text: This hostel offers two great features for meeting other travellers: a wholesome breakfast (including eggs and sausages) from 8 AM until Noon, as well as a 'free, all-you-can-drink caipirinha happy hour' from 5:15 PM until 6:15 PM.
reviews.title: Nice hostel to meet other travellers

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All rooms have ice-cold air conditioning, which is a great feature in sweltering Salvador. Showers are electric, but installed well and provide adequate hot water and pressure.
reviews.title: Best choice for your stay in Salvador

reviews.text: Beds are indeed foam mattresses, but they are more comfortable than most hostel beds on which I have slept. Rooms are tidied up daily by housekeeping staff, which includes the beds themselves.
reviews.title: Possibly the perfect hostel for a none hostel user

reviews.text: Galeria 13 is definately one of the best hostels in which I've stayed in Brazil. It's ideally located in a quiet street of the Pelourinho (the place to be in Salvador). It has spacious dorms and everything is very clean. The staff is multi-lingual and very friendly and helpful. The breakfast is amazingly good with fruits, cakes, eggs and sousages, coffee, juices,... and it lasts from 8 until 12 (!!) It has a couple of nice common areas and a swimming pool, which makes it very social.
reviews.title: Great Hostel and they help me so much
great breakfast - common areas - great location
reviews.text: There is no doubt I'd stay there again if I'm ever in Salvador again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We started our month long trip in Brazil in Salvador and stayed at Hostel Galera 13 for four nights over New Year. We chose this hostel mainly due to the other positive reviews left and also there were a good selection of pictures. As it happens the pictures don't do it justice and the hostel exceeded our expectations. We stayed in a private room and it was spacious and clean as was the en suite shower room. The owner and staff were incredibly helpful and there was a daily notice board detailing trips and events - the City Tour was great and the Happy Hour (free Caipirinhas) should not be missed! A good selection of communal areas within the main hostel (it also has accommodation further along the street opposite its restaurant 'Bar Zulu') meant that people gathered together often by the pool, in the garden/patio area or in the lounge area and chatted and shared stories and helpful advice. The breakfast that is included is excellent and runs from 0800 to midday! The hostel dogs (Zulu a Brazilian Mastiff and Spartan the Boxer) deserve a mention as these were also one of our reasons for choosing to stay! Don't worry if you are not dog lovers as they will generally keep out of your way and there is space for everyone here! If you plan to visit Salvador this is THE place to stay! Great location close to everything and relatively quiet at night. You will not be disappointed!
reviews.title: Excellent hostel and unbeatable location

reviews.text: This hostel is just incredible!!Great location, clean and comfortable rooms and the breakfast!The best you're gonna have in South America!Also the stuff is very helpful, warm and welcoming. We couldn't be more happy with Galeria 13. I can honestly say that this is definitely the best place to stay in Salvador!
reviews.title: excellent hostel

reviews.text: We stayed here 3 nights and it was really friendly. The people working here and owner were excellent and the dogs very friendly. Free caiprinia hour was a superb social experience.
reviews.title: great little hostel, very friendly

reviews.text: The area it self can be a little rough at night so exercise the usual precautions- just take cash. Tuesday nights are excellent. Dont worry about safety though - the hostel itself is VERY secure.
reviews.title: A fantastic place in Pelourinho, Salvador

reviews.text: A perfect place to stay in the Pelourinho area. Staff helpful and friendly, location perfect, free access to internet,... and caipirina for free every day at tea time! Definetely I would recommend you Galeria 13 if you plan to go to Salvador.
reviews.title: Definitely the perfect choise if you are staying in el salvador.

reviews.text: It has to be one of the best hostels in Brazil ... probably South America! Everyone from the smiley kitchen staff to the hardworking cleaners, the reception team to Paulo the owner were friendly, helpful, dedicated and cared - making Galeria 13 a brilliant and fun place to stay.
reviews.title: Staying in Salvador? Book Hostel Galeria 13!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Every evening there were free drinks for an hour or so, meaning everyone got together, chatted and it helped create a nice, relaxed, sociable atmosphere!
reviews.title: I love this hostel!

reviews.text: Breakfasts were generous and delicious with eggs and sausages (!) ... fruit, cheese/ham and bread (and a toastie maker!) ... cakes ... fruit juice and coffee/tea AND it was constantly refilled and served until NOON - especially ideal during Carnaval!
reviews.title: Little gem

reviews.text: The building had character and the location is at the heart of Pelourinho and felt safe / central and there was a (small) pool and sundeck!
reviews.title: Amazing carnival stay :-)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Usual stuff - lockers, wifi, local information (inc a full-low down on Carnaval!!!) were all spot on and ... there is Zulu bar/restaurant just around the corner - amazing for post Carnaval refuelling!
reviews.title: Great hostel

reviews.text: I had a great time in Galeria 13. They have a hour of free caipirinhas, which is great, cause all the guests get together, and keep drinking till party out!
reviews.title: great time, great people, great hostel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The services is great, and I have nothing to complain about!
reviews.title: Great value & good breakfast
Great location, Great Value
reviews.text: The localization is the best, I love Pelourinho. Felt pretty safe.
Thanks Galeria 13, i´m comming back for sure!
reviews.title: Breakfast to 12. Awesome.

reviews.text: People really friendly. Clean place. Excellent breakfast. We didn't like Salvador, but the hostel was nice.
reviews.title: THE place to stay in Salvador!

description: In the heart of Pelourinho, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, are the three houses that make up the Galeria 13 experience: one for social travellers, one for those seeking a quieter stay, and TripAdvisor’s top rated Bar Zulu in between them.This unique blend of moods, sights and flavours has rendered us the Best Hostel in Brazil award as voted by HostelWorld members, and a place in Lonely Planet’s finicky section Our Pick along with some flattering words from the traveller’s holy book.No wonder: by staying with us you get tons of freebies, including our obscenely big breakfast until midday, caipirinha happy hour, swimming pool, and more.
